overview: During a mysterious pandemic, Cassie's quarantine life has turned into a routine, day in and day out. Nothing new seems to happen, until she realizes she's out of coffee. And she's determined to get her cup of joe, even if she must face the horrors of the outside world. Because she'd kill for a cup of coffee.  In this part-animated live action short, anything goes.
tagline: She'd Kill for a Cup of Coffee
title: Routine
